full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD KYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @120A *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD KYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA, SLOB DPON SH'AKYA'I DGE @120B SLONG DBYIG GNYEN GYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR KYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MI TRA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZO BA BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,RGYAL BA KUN BSDUS NGO BO BLA MA DANG, ,RGYAL KUN MKHYEN RAB GCIG BSDUS 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, ,RGYAL BA KUN GYI YUM GCIG DBYANGS CAN MA, ,RGYAL BA YAB SRAS RNAMS LA GUS PAS 'DUD, ,CHOS MNGON @121A *, ,SDE SNOD CHA SHAS YONGS RDZOGS PA'I, ,LUGS BZANG BSIL ZER 'GYID LA ZLA BRAL BA, ,SLOB DPON DBYIG GNYEN YAS SRAS LA SOGS PA'I, ,RIM PAR BRGYUD DE RNAMS LA GUS PAS 'DUD, ,BLO GSAL DANG CING GDUL BYA MANG PO TSOGS` `CHOS LA BRTZON CING THOS BSAM BSGOM GSUM GYIS, ,CHOS MNGON MDZOD KYI GTER PHYE MTHAR SON NAS, ,SKU GSUM NOR BU GLING DU BGROD PAR SHOG ,@121B DANG LDAN SBYIN BDAG 'KHOR DANG BCAS RNAMS KYIS, ,BAR GYI MCHOD SBYIN DPAG BSAM LJON PA LAS, ,GZHAN DON 'BAD MED LHUN GYIS 'GRUB PA DANG, BSKAL LDAN YONGS LA CHOS KYI TSIM PAR SHOG ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS MA RGAN 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA'I RGYA MTSO DANG 'DRES NAS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU BSTAN PA'I KHUR THEG PA'I, ,RGYAL BA DGYES PA'I LAM LA 'JUG PAR SHOG (CES PA 'DI NI RTZIS MKHAN GYI RTA MGRIN KYIS MDZOD RTZAL BAR DU BSKRUN PA'I TSE, SMON TSIGS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^AER TE NI JO BO'I BLA MA NOM CHI PI LIG THU BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
